func.title: Sort_Func
func.desc: Sort criterion: Sorts the found objects by the int result of the indicated function. Objects with smaller values first.
func.remark: Warning: never use this with a function which might have side effects. If a function is not guaranteed to be harmless, a new, side-effect-free function needs to be written.
For additional information on the use of this function see FindObjects.

example.text: Sorts all objects inside a maximum distance of 100 pixels by their width, beginning with small objects.
